string.text: Something with the lads lately I have some neponyatki. To collide with me trying. I do not bodalovo high. Do not settle podsobish golovnyak?
Yes, small boys are not thrilled. Here and there, lads already hints that the stocks you ran. But the bell ringers can I soothe. Plati 10000 and all neponyatki be settled.
Concrete kipesh you raised, brothers want you to put on feathers. This noise can be worked out, but you need to pay 30000.
Throughout the area so much noise on your doorposts! The Fellowship is extremely dissatisfied. Require serious repair the damage. Plati 50000.
Without the bazaar. Keep your money.
A great honor for such sheluponi.
Well, the loot triumphs over evil. Sweeps. Keep your money.
I soaked chushkarya Fraera.
What a deal you got?

Dealers then one turned up just for you. Then one Shnyrov much fuss. The authority is trying to make. Bazaar rotten leads the eye to the lads, drop me tuzhitsya, and such a zapadlo bratvy not in concepts. Skopytish chushkana this - empty handed no escape. Cheb out there who do not bot, but Piggy is responsible for the bazaar! Get to work pretty good gangster coat.
But what drove this fraera?
You're smart though. So Fraerom and they call. Only skopytit it should be in quiet, without kipesha.
This is not zapadlo and fudge.
Sorry. At mokruhu now are not pulled.
Well there you have ...
What cough wanted?
Got my life single. I want to do business with you stir up.
Well. Pay in obshchak 10000 rubles and join us.
Oh, just about anything. Just looked at the light.
Not with me is now kind of money. Look you up later.
Without the bazaar. Keep your money.
What have you there with dolgovtsami namutil?

Bratello, help me. Soak the goat aspiring to, a bullet got him. Fellowship you will be very grateful - to all our lads will go to Kent, answer! If you kill a goat, a prompt where the cache hill Dolgovskogo, Skulls, zanykan. Soak it, but I give the tooth - there'll be waiting for you!
What kind of market, certainly help. Current come on, that I found you then!
Fuck you...
Well fraer, blah, one will be ours for the laces porezhut
You better not flutter, there is already close to blind dogs, cut into circles, and we're in the world to deem
I've soaked your enemy. So what are you hiding rubbed about the Skull?

Gad will. There is such a secret place where the bullet had killed people like to temporarily hide the loot. Tale I whispered that he recently put it chic SVD. Exactly tell you. Age will not be seen. Or maybe something else out there find.
Well ... Better for you would be if you told the truth.
Hey, brakes, which Presov?
Yes I am, this Piggy to go ..
This is why now? Che you want from him?
Talking to him is.
What do you want to ask?
What? Brought the document?
Not yet.
Very bad. I will not wait long. Do you understand?
I think so.
Brought, hold.
Spot bad, well, I keep the word. Made the case without jambs - Get the key from the laboratory. I see you, Spot, do not miss, if you do not ssysh the lab down. Can join us?
Well. And why not? "I?
None. Thanks for the invitation, but I'm handy to be a loner.
Well, we're quits. Now I will not touch you, but in the future better for us to less common. Heh-heh.
It happens.
Spot bad, well, I keep the word. Made the case without jambs - Get the key from the laboratory.
Good health.
Yes this is very Spot! Heard a lot about you. Dark rumors about you go. If you pulled out alive from the death truck. By the way, you have cool flog "Spot". And the reason I called Hog.
I sent an informant
Informant, you say? Hmm ... Okay, what do you want?
And I've got one thing ...
What a deal? Speak.
I'm looking for the key to the door to the lab X18 ...
And why I should give it to you? Maybe for your beautiful eyes?
Can I pay the money.
And a lot of money you pay? Can you ... Okay ... Hmm. Know who sent you. With a bartender we observe neutrality. But we need someone who does not belong to our group, able to do one little errand.
What kind of assignment is it? To kill, I suppose, someone need?

Well, why just kill him? We need to steal some documents from the bartender so that he did not think that this case thieves. Documents are stored in his room, guarded by his men. Do the job - will become his, and with me - the second key from the laboratory.
Well.
I'm not ready
I came on a tip of your rights.
Yes I am aware of. You rescued him. Therefore, we and you have not touched. I listen to you.

And a lot of money you pay? Can you ... Okay ... Hmm. Know who you vouchsafed to descend into this hell, hehe. With a bartender we observe neutrality. But I need a desperate man, able to perform a nontrivial matter ...

Yes I am aware of. You rescued him. And, importantly, you, at his request, had a hand in the murder bullets. Therefore, you can join us. We are not alien to such people. What do you say to my proposal?
What are you staring at me?
Mother of God, who are you?
When I was a man ... from my controller to have tried, but something they have not come there. Die too, failed, and that's been living in this container.

Bandits! Those sons of bitches were taking me to the old factory. I don't know what they were planning to do with me there. I saw them take another guy in there before and I never saw him after that. They've got another one of ours, Serega. They keep him in the basement... in that big unfinished building there. Help him, would ya? Otherwise they'll... you know...
Do you know what they've got there at the factory?

I haven't heard much. All I know is that their boss Borov has part of the key to the underground there. There used to be a lab or something... I did hear that Borov has been eager to get inside, but can't without the second half of the key. Umm... if you're thinking of trying to get inside, think twice before you do. It's full of thugs.
Gotcha. Thanks, I'll keep it in mind.
I'll try to help your man.
It's a shame about my partner... He was a great guy. But still, I owe you.
These things happen.
Thanks for your help!
Bye.
You don't give a damn about people. What's there to discuss between you and me?
Thanks! You got my partner out of there! Here, take this - it's from the bottom of my heart.
Deal.
I guess you must know this area well. What's interesting here?
To the North there's a bandit camp. To the East - an old factory. To the Southwest - a deserted pig farm, and some kind of gate beyond it... I can't say what's there, never been that far.
Would you tell me more about the bandit camp?
Hmm, what about it... They settled in an unfinished building straight North of here. Their leader is Borov - a real animal, that bastard. That's why they sent us here, to finish him off.
What's happening on the factory?
We managed to find out that there is some kind of vault there. Only it's guarded like Fort Knox.
What kind of vault? What's inside it?
I don't know but we dare to step inside. The only thing I do know is that Borov has one half of the key to its entrance.
A real pig farm? With actual pigs?

Drooling for some pork chops already, huh? Heck, the Zone is full of boars! Take a bite of one of those and you won't be needing a flashlight anymore - that's how bad you'll be glowing in the dark! OK, OK, just kidding... The farm has long been abandoned and is now home to some stalkers. They didn't make a good impression on me, though, and I usually trust my gut feeling.
What's this gate you were talking about?
I can't figure it out. Just an old gate, except it's locked and well guarded. We haven't set foot in there.
I see, thanks.
You're welcome! Come back any time.
Just the two of you went on a scouting raid?
There was another guy, Serega. I don't know, he's gone and I haven't heard from him... The gang must have dealt with him after all.
Take care.
So, friend... What's going to happen with me now?.. Thanks. At least you tried to help. And I do keep my word.
Thanks for your help! What else did you want to know about?
You refused to help when I asked you. We have nothing to discuss. Get lost.
Bye.
Hey, buddy! Help me! I'm a Duty scout. Help me get out!
I'll try.
There's nothing I can do for you.

Thanks, brother! I owe you one. Look what I was able to find out - it might prove useful to you, who knows... Borov - the one who calls the shots - has collected quite a lot of goodies. He's got a piece of the key to the lower level at the old factory. I heard the guards yacking, they said there used to be some kind of lab there. Thing is, getting close to Borov isn't so simple.
Thanks for the information.
It's time to get back to our guys. Something tells me we'll be lucky to get out of here alive...
Good luck.
We gotta get outta here before these bastards decide to check this place out! Need something? Get it quick!
Nope, nothing.
Hey! There's a switch over there on the wall - it opens the cell door.
OK, I'll look.

Hey, want an awesome gun? I found a little something near Yantar... a stash, I guess. There was this Gauss rifle among other things. I tell you, this thing rocks - anyone within a hundred meters of it is as good as dead... You can have it for just 800.
Here's the money.
Thanks, but no thanks.
Nah, keep it. Money is hard to come by.
Got the money? Hurry up. I've had a lot of customers... They'll be coming back soon.
Excellent. Wait here, I'll go get it.
Waiting.
Hey, gimme a medkit!
Here you are.
Sorry, I don't have a medkit.

Thanks, you bailed me out for real. If I live long enough to see you again, I'll try to pay you back. Right now all I can spare is a juicy tip. OK, to the South of here, there's a farm where some easygoing stalkers set up camp. One of them is selling a Gauss rifle real cheap, just 800. I was going to buy it, and then got knee deep in shit... So, if you've got the dough, go right ahead.
Thanks for the information.
I owe you, and I always repay my debts. Let's go.
Excellent. Now we'll tear everyone up.
Sorry, I have other plans.
Well, good luck then.
Bye.
